titleInfo.title: Wedding Portrait of Sam and Bertha Flax

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: ''#118 Mr. and Mrs. Sam Flax Married Cripple Creek 1907 or 1909.'' On envelope: ''#118 Mr. and Mrs. Sam Flax, 1909 Cripple Creek''.

mods.abstract: Sam Flax wears a three-piece suit, tie and gold watch. Bertha Flax wears a white gown and gold pin.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 116.
